name: Productive Human Endeavour Limited
goal:
The objective of Productive Human Endeavour Limited is to provide the financial services industry with the benefits derived from the practical experience that John C Perry - Managing Director - has gained by having worked for over 37 years in HSBC serving in the Group Head Office as well as in its principal subsidiaries in Asia, Middle East, Europe, South and North America

My focus is risk and capital management, and governance. I am particularly interested in EU legislation and EBA rules relating to the banking and investment firm sectors
interests: Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
euInitiatives: Review of the prudential framework for investment firms as set out by the Commission in December 2017
